title: MPEG_material_stereo
description: A glTF extension defined by MPEG to support stereoscopic applications and applied to the 'material' object.

layers.description: An array of stereo layers describing the textures associated with a material. Limited to two items (left/right).

items.title: Layer
items.description: Layer definition within the MPEG_material_stereo extension. Exactly one layer must have primaryReference set to true.

primaryReference.description: True if this layer is the primary (hero) component.

texture.description: Index of the referenced texture within the glTF 'textures' array.

eyeChannel.description: Eye channel: 0 = left eye, 1 = right eye.
